summary: THERE WAS A BURNING SMELL COMING FROM THE VEHICLE'S CLUTCH AND IT WOULDN'T GO INTO 1ST OR 2ND GEAR.   THE DEALER WAS NOTIFIED.  PH  THE TRANSMISSION FAILED , AND THE CLUTCH BURNED.  THE CABLE WAS REINSTALLED.  THERE WAS A CHATTERING IN THE CLUTCH, AND THE CLUTCH PEDAL HAD GONE TO THE FLOOR BEFORE BEING ABLE TO SHIFT.  THE ENTIRE CLUTCH SYSTEM WAS REPLACED.  ALSO THE SLAVE CYLINDER WAS BLED.  SCC
